<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Devil's Bargain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1844)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Evil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=64" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 15 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Those favored by [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=2) can be found wearing this _+1 [studded leather](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)_, which is lacquered in red and black.

<document level="2" id="action-1538" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
